title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5103.1 - Entities permitted to obtain a video lottery gaming agent license
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5103.1 - Entities permitted to obtain a video lottery gaming agent license

State Regulations

Unless otherwise permitted by law, only racetracks
authorized by article 34 of the Tax Law to operate a video lottery gaming
facility may apply for and obtain a video lottery gaming agent
license. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5103.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
